subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The rookie center Nicklas Backstrom’s attempt to clear the puck went horribly wrong Sunday, providing the visiting Pittsburgh Penguins with the winning goal in a 4-2 victory against Washington.
snippet: The rookie center Nicklas Backstrom’s attempt to clear the puck went horribly wrong Sunday, providing the visiting Pittsburgh Penguins with the winning goal in a 4-2 victory against Washington.
